mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_TRAINER, PRODUCT_NAME, MEMPRODUCT_START, MEMPRODUCT_END FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MPRODUCT USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N' AND BLACKLIST_STATUS='N' AND NVL(MEMPRODUCT_END, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_TRAINER, PAUSE_START, PAUSE_END, PRODUCT_NAME, MEMPRODUCT_START, MEMPRODUCT_END FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MPRODUCT USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='P' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_TRAINER, BLACKLIST_ENROLLDATE, BLACKLIST_CONTENT FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MPRODUCT USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N' AND BLACKLIST_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_TRAINER, PRODUCT_NAME, MEMPRODUCT_START, MEMPRODUCT_END FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MPRODUCT USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_STATUS='N' AND SYSDATE > MEMPRODUCT_END ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_HEIGHT, MEMBER_WEIGHT, MEMBER_NOTE, MEMBER_TRAINER, MEMBER_BIRTH, PAUSE_START, PAUSE_END, PRODUCT_NAME, MEMPRODUCT_START, MEMPRODUCT_END, LOCKER_NO FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MPRODUCT USING (MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN LOCKER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{mno}
mapper.insert: insert into member values (seq_memno.nextval, #{memberName}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberHeight}, #{memberWeight}, #{memberImage}, default, #{memberNote}, default, null, null, default, null, #{memberBirth}, null, null)
